verses.verse: And it shall be, <S%H3588>when<s%> you are <S%H935>come<s%> in to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you for an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein;

That you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H127>earth,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you, and shall <S%H7760>put<s%> it in a <S%H2935>basket,<s%> and shall <S%H1980>go<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> to <S%H7931>place<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And you shall <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest<s%> that shall be in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to him, I <S%H5046>profess<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> that I am <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to our <S%H1>fathers<s%> for to <S%H5414>give<s%> us.

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H2935>basket<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3240>set<s%> it down <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

And you shall <S%H6030>speak<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> A <S%H761>Syrian<s%> ready to <S%H6>perish<s%> was my <S%H1>father,<s%> and he <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> with a <S%H4592>few,<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> a <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H1419>great,<s%> <S%H6099>mighty,<s%> and <S%H7227>populous:<s%>
And the <S%H4713>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7489>evil<s%> entreated us, and <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> us, and <S%H5414>laid<s%> on us <S%H7186>hard<s%> <S%H5656>bondage:<s%>

And when we <S%H6817>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> our <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked<s%> on our <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> and our <S%H5999>labor,<s%> and our <S%H3906>oppression:<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and with an <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terribleness,<s%> and with <S%H226>signs,<s%> and with <S%H4159>wonders:<s%>

And he has <S%H935>brought<s%> us <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and has <S%H5414>given<s%> us <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> even a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H935>brought<s%> the first <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of the <S%H127>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> me. And you shall <S%H3240>set<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God:<s%>

And you shall <S%H8056>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> thing <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> to you, and to your <S%H1004>house,<s%> you, and the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> and the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

<S%H3588>When<s%> you have made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H6237>tithing<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4643>tithes<s%> of your <S%H8393>increase<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8141>year,<s%> which is the <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4643>tithing,<s%> and have <S%H5414>given<s%> it to the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and the <S%H490>widow,<s%> that they may <S%H398>eat<s%> within your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> and be <S%H7646>filled;<s%>

Then you shall <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> I have <S%H1197>brought<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> the <S%H6944>hallowed<s%> things out of my <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> have <S%H5414>given<s%> them to the <S%H3881>Levite,<s%> and to the <S%H1616>stranger,<s%> to the <S%H3490>fatherless,<s%> and to the <S%H490>widow,<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me: I have not <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> your <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have I <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> them.

I have not <S%H398>eaten<s%> thereof in my <S%H205>mourning,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> have I <S%H1197>taken<s%> <S%H1197>away<s%> ought thereof for any <S%H2931>unclean<s%> use, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>given<s%> ought thereof for the <S%H4191>dead:<s%> but I have <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> and have <S%H6213>done<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that you have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me.

<S%H8259>Look<s%> down from your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation,<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H5414>given<s%> us, as you <S%H7650>swore<s%> to our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments:<s%> you shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

You have <S%H559>avouched<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> to be your <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to his <S%H6963>voice:<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H559>avouched<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> to be his <S%H5459>peculiar<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> as he has <S%H1696>promised<s%> you, and that you should <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments;<s%>

And to <S%H6213>make<s%> you <S%H5945>high<s%> <S%H5921>above<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H6213>made,<s%> in <S%H8416>praise,<s%> and in <S%H8034>name,<s%> and in <S%H8597>honor;<s%> and that you may be an <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> as he has <S%H1696>spoken.<s%>
